title: Trouble with CMPLXF and Clang
body:
*Original issue*: https://gitlab.com/lfortran/lfortran/-/issues/264

```bash
[ 96%] Built target test_parse
/nix/store/cp1sa3xxvl71cypiinw2c62i5s33chlr-binutils-2.35.1/bin/ld: ../../runtime/liblfortran_runtime_static.a(lfort_intrinsics.c.o): in function `_lfortran_complex_pow':
/home/haozeke/Git/Gitlab/lfortran/src/runtime/lfort_intrinsics.c:87: undefined reference to `CMPLXF'
/nix/store/cp1sa3xxvl71cypiinw2c62i5s33chlr-binutils-2.35.1/bin/ld: /home/haozeke/Git/Gitlab/lfortran/src/runtime/lfort_intrinsics.c:88: undefined reference to `CMPLXF'
clang-11: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[2]: *** [src/lfortran/tests/CMakeFiles/test_llvm.dir/build.make:156: src/lfortran/tests/test_llvm] Error 1
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/Makefile2:520: src/lfortran/tests/CMakeFiles/test_llvm.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
[ 98%] Linking CXX executable cpptranslate
[ 98%] Built target cpptranslate
[100%] Linking CXX executable lfortran
/nix/store/cp1sa3xxvl71cypiinw2c62i5s33chlr-binutils-2.35.1/bin/ld: ../runtime/liblfortran_runtime_static.a(lfort_intrinsics.c.o): in function `_lfortran_complex_pow':
/home/haozeke/Git/Gitlab/lfortran/src/runtime/lfort_intrinsics.c:87: undefined reference to `CMPLXF'
/nix/store/cp1sa3xxvl71cypiinw2c62i5s33chlr-binutils-2.35.1/bin/ld: /home/haozeke/Git/Gitlab/lfortran/src/runtime/lfort_intrinsics.c:88: undefined reference to `CMPLXF'
clang-11: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[2]: *** [src/bin/CMakeFiles/lfortran.dir/build.make:170: src/bin/lfortran] Error 1
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/Makefile2:717: src/bin/CMakeFiles/lfortran.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [Makefile:182: all] Error 2
```

To reproduce, use the following `build1.sh`:
```bash
export MAKEFLAGS=-j$(nproc)

mkdir -p build && cd build
cmake \
    -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug \
    -DWITH_LLVM=yes \
    -DLFORTRAN_BUILD_ALL=yes \
    -DWITH_STACKTRACE=yes \
    -DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH="$CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH_LFORTRAN;$CONDA_PREFIX" \
    -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=`pwd`/inst \
    ..
cmake --build . --target install
```

Then (using https://gitlab.com/lfortran/lfortran/-/merge_requests/694):
```bash
nix-shell --run "bash" --cores 4 -j4 --pure ci/shell.nix --argstr clangOnly "yes"
./build0.sh
./build1.sh
```
